summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DineDash Reserve Admin Panel and i18n features. All backend APIs pass (20/21 tests), frontend UI fully functional.

issues: Missing data-testid attributes on tab buttons (Overview, Restaurants, Orders, Reservations, Users) - recommend adding for better test automation

action_items: Add data-testid attributes to admin dashboard tab buttons for better test automation
critical_code_review_comments: Admin APIs working correctly - all CRUD operations functional
Language toggle (i18n) working perfectly - switches between English and Hindi
Customer ordering flow complete - add to cart, checkout, payment options all working
context_for_next_testing_agent: All admin panel features tested and working: Admin login, Dashboard stats, Restaurant management (view/suspend/approve), Order management (view/update status), Reservation management (view/update status), User management (view/suspend/activate). Language toggle (i18n) tested - switches between English and Hindi correctly. Customer ordering flow tested - login, browse restaurants, add to cart, checkout page all working.

admin_auth.details: Admin login with admin@dinedash.com/admin123 works, redirects to /admin dashboard

admin_dashboard_stats.details: Shows Total Revenue, Total Orders, Total Reservations, Total Users, Restaurants count, Pending Orders, Recent activity

admin_restaurants_management.details: Lists 8 restaurants with owner info, cuisine, orders count, revenue, status. Suspend/Approve actions work

admin_orders_management.details: Shows orders with ID, restaurant, customer, amount, payment status, order status. Status dropdown for updates

admin_reservations_management.details: Shows reservations table (currently empty). Status update API tested via backend

admin_users_management.details: Lists all users with role badges, activity stats, status. Suspend/Activate actions work

language_toggle.details: Toggle switches between English and Hindi. All text on HomePage translates correctly

customer_ordering_flow.details: Login -> Browse restaurants -> View menu -> Add to cart -> Checkout page with delivery details and payment options
